name: ChosunTrivia
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chosun trivia
des:
Train for your next belt test with the Chosun Trivia skill. 

To start, just say "Alexa, start Chosun Trivia". You will then be asked which belt level you want to focus on. Say "all" if you want to be quizzed on all belt levels. You can then choose to TRAIN, QUIZ, or ask Alexa about a term or concept. 
"TRAIN" will have Alexa read you the vocabulary and concepts you need to know for the belt level you chose.
"QUIZ" will start a 5 question quiz.
You can also ask about one concept by saying something like, "Tell me about BULLYING."

At anytime, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop"
